snippet: As the Knicks prepared to face the Trail Blazers in Portland, Carmelo Anthony was back in New York on Thursday, having fluid drained from his back of his right knee.
abstract: New York Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony has fluid drained from his right knee and is questionable for upcoming game against Los Angeles Clippers.
lead_paragraph: As the Knicks prepared to face the Trail Blazers in Portland, Carmelo Anthony was back in New York on Thursday, having fluid drained from his back of his right knee.

headline.seo: Carmelo Anthony’s Knee Has No Structural Damage
headline.main: No Structural Damage in Anthony’s Sore Knee
headline.print_headline: No Structural Damage In Anthony’s Sore Knee
